attributes.action: stop Amy Chadling Grubbers Golding from being moved into the naughty corner.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Amy is being forced to uproot from her home on the features desk, leaving behind her friends and family, and move in with an evil ginger snapper. All her legal rights have been removed and her eviction is imminent. She is currently discombobulated disappointed and distressed. Immediate help is required.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
